snippet.title: Blue Prince | Release Trailer
snippet.description:
The atmospheric architectural adventure Blue Prince has finally launched on Steam, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and Windows, as well as PS+ Game Catalogue and Game Pass day 1. 

We are super excited to finally open the doors to the mysterious Mount Holly Manor, with its 45 shifting rooms. Prepare to embark on a genre-defying puzzle strategy adventure, where you will draft rooms, unravel mysteries, solve puzzles, and develop architectural strategies as you try to track down the mysterious “Room 46”.
